page.title: 05HARDGATE FIRE STATION
page.content: This fire station covers the area of Clydebank,Dumbarton,Helensburgh,Bishop briggs,Kirkintilloch,Cumbernauld and Milngavie. There are 3/4 appliances,one accident unit and a dingy for river rescue.In the station itself there are garages for the vehicles,offices,rest rooms for the firemen and outside there is a 30ft. training tower. Altogether there are 40 firemen, 15 officers and 4 office personel.The men work two weeks day shift then two weeks night shift then have four days off. On average the firemen attend 810 fires a year.
